channel.title: Lost – First Time Flowing
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: Smoke Monster
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Current theory: the smoke monster/Esau is an alien stranded on earth either literally (he hails from beyond the stars), temporally (he comes from the future) or dimensionally (he is a secret man was not meant to know). When he says, “I want to go home,” he’s not talking about Hoboken. Oh, and Sayid for Juliet […]
item.content:encoded:
Current theory: the smoke monster/Esau is an alien stranded on earth either literally (he hails from beyond the stars), temporally (he comes from the future) or dimensionally (he is a secret man was not meant to know). When he says, “I want to go home,” he’s not talking about Hoboken.

Oh, and Sayid for Juliet is not a fair trade.
